content:
In addition to changing the verb forms, please rewrite the sentence to include a time adverbial that indicates a specific time of day. 
Given Prompt: 
Rewrite the following sentence to change the verb forms.
Julie eats cereal for breakfast every morning.
Rewritten Prompt:
Along with changing the verb forms, please add a condition to the sentence that specifies the type of cereal Julie eats for breakfast.
Julie was eating oatmeal cereal for breakfast every morning at 8 a.m.
